title: Executive Order 8053-Partial Revocation of Executive Orders of January 24, 1914
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 1 of the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, the Executive Orders of January 24, 1914, creating Public Water Reserves Nos. 14 and 15, are hereby revoked in so far as they pertain to or affect the following-described lands in California and Oregon:
T. 4 S., R. 6 E., sec. 12, NE¼NW¼.
T. 40 S., R. 11 E., Unsurveyed. All lands within one-quarter mile of a spring located in what will probably be when surveyed sec. 7.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8053-Partial Revocation of Executive Orders of January 24, 1914 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/210590
